The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Emanuel J. Johnson et al., Defendants-Appellants.(Nos. 53920, 53921 cons.;First DistrictJune 21, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Fred Shandling and James J. Doherty, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel,) for appellants.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and William K. Hedrick, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE GOLDBERG.
